name: Peak Personage Stealth Rogue, Shojodoji
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Bind two cards with "Stealth" in their card names from soul], choose two of your opponent's (RC), bind all of the cards on the chosen (RC), and your opponent puts those cards into their hand at the end of that turn.
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put two rear-guards into soul], choose a card with "Stealth" in its card name from your bind zone, call it to (RC), and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, that called unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Stealth Dragon, Unpreceden
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) by a card's ability, if you have a vanguard with "Tamayura" or "Shojodoji" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and draw a card.
[CONT](RC):If two or more of your cards were put from (RC) into your soul this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000.

name: Silver Thorn Dragon Tamer, Luquier
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Put a card from hand into soul], choose up to three unit cards with different grades from your soul, call them to (RC), and if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, those called units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC):At the end of your turn, [COST][put two rear-guards into soul], and draw a card.

name: Silver Thorn, Rising Dragon
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][put a card from hand into soul], and draw a card.
[CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a vanguard with "Luquier" in its card name, and two or more of your units were placed on (RC) from soul this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000, and if four or more were placed, it gets [Power] +10000.

name: Monster Creator, Arkhite
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When your rear-guard with "Monster" in its card name is placed, [COST][put a card with the same card name as that card from order zone on the bottom of deck], and that unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if your order zone has a Research card, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and activate all of the effects below.

・If your order zone has three or more Research cards, choose up to one of your rear-guards with "Monster" in its card name, and put it into your order zone.

・Look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one unit card with "Monster" in its card name from among them, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.

name: Reception Monster, Wavyloss
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a vanguard with "Arkhite" in its card name or [Glitter] with "Eva" in its card name on your (VC), [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and draw a card.
[CONT](RC):During your turn, if your order zone has three or more Research cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Omniscience Regalia, Minerva
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if your soul has a grade 3 card with "Regalia" in its card name, all of your front row units get [Power] +5000.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your soul.
[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 3 & discard a card with only 《Genesis》 for its clan from hand], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -1 until end of turn.

name: Regalia of Wisdom, Angelica
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if you have a vanguard with "Minerva" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. Then, [COST][put this unit into soul], and [Counter-Charge 1].

name: Blue Storm Dragon, Maelstrom
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Discard a card from hand], choose a unit card with only 《Aqua Force》 for its clan or a ＜Tear Dragon＞ from your soul, call it to (RC), it gets "[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, and it is the first battle of this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit." until end of turn, and at the end of that turn, put it into your soul.
[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if it is the fourth battle of this turn or more, draw a card, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.

name: Tidal Assault
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards with "Maelstrom" in its card name, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Undoubting Flame Sword, Radylina
effect:
[AUTO](RC):At the beginning of your main phase, If you do not have a Momokke token on your (RC), call up to one Momokke token to (RC).
[Glitter]-Rorowa (Active if your vanguard is a [Glitter] with "Rorowa" in its card name)

If a unit with "Rarami" in its card name was put into your soul by this effect, and you did not [Counter-Charge] this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and [Counter-Charge 1]. (Putting into soul is mandatory)

If a unit with "Ririmi" in its card name was put into your soul by this effect, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. (Putting into soul is mandatory)
